entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning.
